title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify your Kubernetes journey with Amazon EKS Capabilities (CNS378)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon EKS 功能简化您的 Kubernetes 之旅 (CNS378)
abstract: Amazon EKS has launched new managed Kubernetes capabilities for workload orchestration and resource management, to help you build and scale with Kubernetes on AWS. Kubernetes is a powerful standard for scheduling workloads, but supporting multiple environments, managing fleets of clusters, and maintaining configuration at scale all present challenges and friction. This typically results in installing and managing open source components yourself. In this session, learn how you can leverage Amazon EKS to more easily meet these foundational needs, with AWS doing the heavy lifting so that you can focus on building and shipping software, rather than managing and scaling platforms.
abstract_cn: Amazon EKS 推出了新的托管 Kubernetes 功能，用于工作负载编排和资源管理，帮助您在 AWS 上使用 Kubernetes 构建和扩展应用。Kubernetes 是调度工作负载的强大标准，但支持多环境、管理集群群组以及大规模维护配置都带来了挑战和阻力。这通常导致需要自行安装和管理开源组件。在本次会议中，了解如何利用 Amazon EKS 更轻松地满足这些基础需求，由 AWS 承担繁重工作，让您专注于构建和交付软件，而非管理和扩展平台。
